title: Elohell
body:
I just want to kill my self, at first i wrote a long text here, but i know i will drop more and more with such teams.
If ur Team at min 1 gave as he double kill...............

replies.body:
Aw man, we've all had those touchy games that just make you question why you're playing at all. Sometimes you just need to find some other teammates who are on your level, and sometimes maybe you just need a break to get that fighting spirit back. 

Whatever you decide, we're always open to talk about any rough matches you might have had. Feel free to hit me back up and we can chat for a bit, or check out [**Player Recruitment**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment) to try getting a niche team put together!
